title: Monarch OLS
about: An instance of EBI's OLS with Monarch-specific ontologies.
name: @matentzn

title: KG Registry
about: A simple registry for knowledge graphs, including KG-Hub projects.
name: @cmungall

title: KG Hub
about: A collection of biological and biomedical Knowledge Graphs, including their component data sources.
name: @cmungall

title: LinkML Registry
about: A collection of LinkML schemas.
name: @cmungall

title: Monarch Mapping Commons
about: SSSOM Mappings collected and curated by the Monarch Initiative.
name: @kevinschaper

title: Human Phenotype Ontology
about: The **Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)** is a structured vocabulary used to describe human health conditions and symptoms in a standardized way. It helps doctors, researchers, and computer systems consistently record and analyze patient characteristics, especially in the context of rare diseases. By organizing thousands of clinical features into a searchable hierarchy, HPO supports better diagnosis, data sharing, and discovery in genetic medicine.
tagline: A standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities in human disease.
name: @pnrobinson

title: Mondo Disease Ontology
about: A disease ontology that integrates and harmonizes disease definitions from multiple sources.
name: @cmungall

title: Genotype Ontology
about: An ontology that represents the levels of genetic variation specified in genotypes.
name: @mbrush

title: Scientific Evidence and Provenance Information Ontology
about: An ontology that supports the description of evidence and provenance information for scientific claims.
name: @mbrush

title: Vertebrate Breed Ontology
about: An ontology created to serve as a single computable resource for vertebrate breed names.
name: @sabrinatoro

title: The Unified Phenotype Ontology (uPheno)
about: Aims to unify the annotation of phenotypes across species.
name: @udp

title: Uberon Anatomy Ontology
about: An integrated cross-species anatomy ontology.
name: @cmungall

title: Phenopackets
about: An ISO-endorsed open standard for sharing disease and phenotype information.
name: @pnrobinson

title: Simple Standard for Ontology Mappings (SSSOM)
about: A simple metadata standard for describing semantic mappings.
name: @matentzn

title: Exomiser
about: A tool for finding potential disease-causing variants in whole-exome or whole-genome sequencing data.
name: @julesjacobsen

title: Ontology Development Kit (ODK)
about: A toolkit and workflow system for managing the ontology life-cycle.
name: @matentzn

title: Ontology Access Kit (OAK)
about: A python toolkit for accessing and visualising ontologies.
name: @cmungall

title: PhEval
about: PhEval is a Python package for evaluating phenotype-powered variant prioritisation systems such as Exomiser.
name: @julesjacobsen

title: OntoGPT
about: OntoGPT is a Python package for extracting structured information from text with large language models (LLMs), instruction prompts, and ontology-based grounding.
name: @cmungall

title: CurateGPT
about: AI Assisted Ontology Curation.
name: @cmungall

title: LinkML
about: The Linked Data Modeling Language (LinkML) is a flexible modeling language that allows you to author schemas (models) in YAML that describe the structure of your data.
name: @cmungall
